title: Erwerb einer Tiefziehmaschine gemäß dem Entwicklungsprogramm des Unternehmens und der notwendigen Hilfsausrüstung und Maschinen für die Herstellung von Formteilen.
abstract: Herstellung von Maschinen- und Anlagenformen durch Tiefziehen.Aufbau eines zusätzlichen Raumes in Kurikka, wo Finnlands größte Tiefziehmaschine installiert wird. Darüber hinaus wird auf dem Gelände ein Kran für den Transfer von schweren Werkzeugen installiert, sowie ein funktionales Regalsystem zur Aufbewahrung großer Werkzeuge und deren Wartung.

motivations: The company needs to upgrade its manufacturing capabilities to produce machine and plant molds through deep drawing.
There is a requirement for a dedicated space and specialized equipment to handle heavy tools and molds.
objectives: Acquire a deep drawing machine according to the company's development program.
Establish an additional room in Kurikka for the installation of Finland's largest deep drawing machine.
Install a crane and a functional shelving system for transferring and storing heavy tools and molds.
methods: Purchase and install a deep drawing machine and necessary auxiliary equipment.
Construct an additional room in Kurikka for the machine and supporting infrastructure.
Implement a crane and shelving system for efficient tool handling and storage.
results: Enhance the company's manufacturing capabilities for producing machine and plant molds.
Improve efficiency and safety in handling heavy tools and molds.
llama_json.research_subject: Acquisition and installation of a deep drawing machine and supporting equipment for manufacturing machine and plant molds

motivations: The company needs to expand its production capabilities and improve the manufacturing process of machine and plant molds.
There is a need for additional space and equipment to accommodate Finland's largest deep-drawing machine.
objectives: Acquire a deep-drawing machine as part of the company's development program.
Establish an additional space in Kurikka for the installation of the deep-drawing machine.
Install necessary auxiliary equipment and machinery for the production of molded parts, including a crane for heavy tool transfer and a functional shelving system for tool storage and maintenance.
methods: Acquisition of a deep-drawing machine and necessary auxiliary equipment.
Construction of an additional space in Kurikka for the installation of the machine.
Installation of a crane and a functional shelving system for tool storage and maintenance.
results: Enhanced production capabilities for machine and plant molds.
Improved storage and maintenance of large tools.
Increased efficiency in the transfer of heavy tools.
openai_json.research_subject: Acquisition and installation of a deep-drawing machine and auxiliary equipment for the production of molded parts

motivations: The company needs to expand its manufacturing capabilities for machine and equipment forms through deep drawing technology.
There is a requirement for infrastructure to handle and store large, heavy tools efficiently.
objectives: Acquire and install Finland's largest deep drawing machine along with necessary auxiliary equipment for manufacturing molded parts.
Establish additional facilities in Kurikka with appropriate infrastructure for heavy tool handling and storage.
methods: Installation of a deep drawing machine for manufacturing machine and equipment forms.
Construction of additional space with crane systems for heavy tool transfer and functional shelving systems for tool storage and maintenance.
results: Enhanced manufacturing capacity for producing machine and equipment forms through deep drawing technology.
Improved operational efficiency through dedicated infrastructure for handling and maintaining large tools.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Industrial expansion for deep drawing manufacturing capabilities
